Name: Zoning, 217-14 24th Avenue Rezoning, Queens (C 240297 ZMQ).
Title: Application number C 240297 ZMQ (217-14 24th Avenue Rezoning) submitted by BMBT LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 11a, changing from an R1-2 District to an R6 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 11, Council District 19.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
